data.name: Loop
data.xml_template:
<route>
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <loop copy="true">
        <constant>
            {{count}}
        </constant>
        <multicast>
            {{#each handles.[0].to}}
            <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
            {{/each}}
        </multicast>
    </loop>
    <multicast>
        {{#each handles.[1].to}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
